backer-description: TON Fusion leverages Tonsquare, a Layer 2 solution on the TONBlockchain, enhancing transaction throughput and significantly reducing fees. Handle millions of transactions per second seamlessly.
content-backer-1: Easily transfer assets between TON and EVM-compatible chains. Our integrated system ensures you benefit from the best of both ecosystems, optimizing your trading and staking.
content-backer-2: Trust and transparency are fundamental to DeFi. TON Fusion leverages Celestias Data Availability solution to ensure the integrity and accessibility of all on-chain data.
